name: The Second First Adventure
description:
What is this odd, simple text-based JS game?

How nice of you to ask! This, fine sir/madam, is a simpler recreation of one of the first text based games, Colossal Cave Adventure. Choose your difficulty, and you're off into the wild!

Some features include: 

- There are different items and potions (1 OP version of each),

- Different difficulties which change the amount of potion potency or the amount of enemies you face.

- Enjoy exploring different locations, enemies, and adventures!

If you accidentally close out, refresh the page!
